definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: When transferred to peat, gardening soil or vermiculite, the shoots can propagate themselves.
sentences.chinese: 組培材料移栽到草炭土，蛭石和園土後，均可繁殖。

sentences.english: I tried filling tubing with vermiculite before bending but it didn't work for me.
sentences.chinese: 我試圖填補蛭石油管前彎曲但它沒有對我的工作。

sentences.english: In this paper, the small-scale planet style ball mill is applied to manufacture the industrial roseite powder in XinJiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 本研究採用小型行星式球磨機加工新疆工業蛭石粉體。

sentences.english: Water repellent for powers, fibres, perlite and expanded vermiculite.
sentences.chinese: 粉末，纖維，珍珠岩，膨脹的蛭石。

sentences.english: This has provided detailed information for extending the application of vermiculite.
sentences.chinese: 爲拓展蛭石礦物的應用提供了較詳盡的資料。

sentences.english: Vermiculite is a dominated industrial commodity in China.
sentences.chinese: 蛭石礦物是我國的優勢非金屬礦種。

sentences.english: Vermiculite tends to collapse in a short time.
sentences.chinese: 蛭石在短期內就會分解。

sentences.english: If spilled soak up with vermiculite and dispose of as organic waste.
sentences.chinese: 如果濺出，要用蛭石吸收並按有機廢棄物處理。

sentences.english: The existing status of interlayer water in vermiculite was investigated with infrared spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 利用紅外光譜研究了蛭石礦物材料層間水的賦存狀態。

definition: base solvent (of chemical compound)/stroma (framing biological tissue)
